title: PiXel ScaLer

form.original-pixel-size-hint: Specify the size of 1 pixel for pre-scaled images

ogp-description: This is a web application that can resize pixel arts to illustration style.

error.invalid-image-type: Please select a png, jpeg or gif. ({filename})
error.invalid-image-size: The pixel size does not match the image size. ({filename})
error.duplicate-image-and-settings: This image and settings combination has already been converted.
error.invalid-url: Unable to load file ({filename}). If you have changed the file, please select the file again.
error.unknown: An error has occurred. Please send the following message to the developer: {message}

what-is.heading: What is this
steps: PiXel ScaLer is a scaling application that provides a relatively easy way to convert pixel art to illustration style art using xBRjs.
You may use the converted pixel art for personal or commercial use within the limits of your conscience.

usage.heading: Usage
steps: Select or drag & drop pixel art to add it.
Set the scale factor (100% to 10000%) in the scale input field.
If you're enlarging a full-size pixel art, set "pixel" to 1. If you're enlarging a previously enlarged image, set the number to match the enlargement rate.
An enlarged illustration style image will appear.
Click the download icon or ZIP download button under the image to save it.

tips.heading: Tips
steps: Converting pixel art of the original size will yield the best results.
Images that are not pixel art will not be enlarged nicely.
You can anti-alias the pixel art by setting the scale factor to 100%.
The conversion may fail if the specified pixel size is different from the pixel size of the pixel art.

version.new-notice: The latest version v.{version} has been released
version.new-download: Download it from booth or github!
